title: Best of the Program | Guests: Donald J. Trump & Alex Epstein | 3/25/22
description:
Glenn starts off the show with an interview with former President Donald Trump regarding his lawsuit against Hillary Clinton and the DNC. Bill O’Reilly joins to discuss the news of the week, including Putin’s losing war against Ukraine and the Ketanji Brown Jackson confirmation hearing. Alex Epstein, author of "The Moral Case for Fossil Fuels," joins to discuss the fascistic movement to cripple the fuel industry.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
